title: Who killed Jenny Langby?
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, John Morris and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: An award winning portrayal by director Donald Crombie of a suburban mother who is a victim of the pressures and pace of modern urban life. The domestic situation before and after her suicide are re-created for a dramatic examination of cause and effect. Docu-drama presented as an interview by Anne Deveson.
